verses.text: \w Now|strong="H1961"\w* Hiram, king \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Tyre, hearing \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* king \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w place|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* father, sent \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5647"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*; \w for|strong="H0776"\w* Hiram \w had|strong="H1961"\w* ever \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* friend \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w David|strong="H3117"\w*.
\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* sent back word \w to|strong="H1961"\w* Hiram, saying,

You \w have|strong="H6629"\w* knowledge that David my father \w was|strong="H6629"\w* not able \w to|strong="H0905"\w* make a house \w for|strong="H1241"\w* \w the|strong="H0905"\w* name \w of|strong="H6629"\w* \w the|strong="H0905"\w* Lord his God, because \w of|strong="H6629"\w* \w the|strong="H0905"\w* wars which \w were|strong="H6629"\w* round him on every side, till \w the|strong="H0905"\w* Lord put all those who \w were|strong="H6629"\w* against him under his feet.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w now|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w my|strong="H3605"\w* God \w has|strong="H1961"\w* given \w me|strong="H1961"\w* \w rest|strong="H1961"\w* \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w side|strong="H5439"\w*; \w no|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w making|strong="H3605"\w* trouble, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* evil \w is|strong="H1931"\w* taking \w place|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w so|strong="H3427"\w* \w it|strong="H5704"\w* \w is|strong="H0376"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* purpose \w to|strong="H5704"\w* make \w a|strong="H5704"\w* house \w for|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* name \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w my|strong="H3605"\w* God, \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* said \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w David|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* father, \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* son, whom \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* make king \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w place|strong="H8478"\w*, \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* builder \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H5704"\w* house \w for|strong="H8478"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* name.

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w now|strong="H1961"\w*, \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H1961"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* cedar-trees \w from|strong="H1961"\w* Lebanon cut down \w for|strong="H8010"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*, \w and|strong="H0505"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* servants \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H8147"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* servants; \w and|strong="H0505"\w* \w I|strong="H8147"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w give|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H1961"\w* payment \w for|strong="H8010"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* servants \w at|strong="H1961"\w* whatever rate \w you|strong="H1961"\w* say; \w for|strong="H8010"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* common knowledge \w that|strong="H1961"\w* we \w have|strong="H1961"\w* no \w such|strong="H1961"\w* wood-cutters among us \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w men|strong="H8147"\w* \w of|strong="H8147"\w* Zidon.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w made|strong="H3605"\w* Hiram glad, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w said|strong="H0413"\w*, Now \w may|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w be|strong="H3808"\w* praised \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w has|strong="H0376"\w* given \w to|strong="H0413"\w* David \w a|strong="H3808"\w* wise son \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w over|strong="H0413"\w* \w this|strong="H0428"\w* great \w people|strong="H0376"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* Hiram sent \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Solomon, saying; \w The|strong="H0834"\w* words \w you|strong="H0834"\w* sent \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* given \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w do|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H0376"\w* \w your|strong="H0834"\w* desire \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* question \w of|strong="H0376"\w* cedar-wood \w and|strong="H0935"\w* cypress-wood.

\w My|strong="H5414"\w* men \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w take|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w down|strong="H5414"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* Lebanon \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w where|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* corded \w together|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* go \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w whatever|strong="H0834"\w* \w place|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* say, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* cut \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w there|strong="H0834"\w* \w so|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H0430"\w* \w take|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* away; \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* payment, \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* \w enough|strong="H3966"\w* \w if|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* food \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H0834"\w*.

So Hiram gave \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* cedar-wood \w and|strong="H1121"\w* cypress-wood \w he|strong="H8010"\w* \w had|strong="H8010"\w* need \w of|strong="H1121"\w*;

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Solomon \w gave|strong="H1961"\w* Hiram twenty thousand measures \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w grain|strong="H3605"\w*, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* food \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H0120"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* twenty measures \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w clear|strong="H3605"\w* oil; \w this|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H0120"\w* did \w every|strong="H3605"\w* year.

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* Lord \w had|strong="H1961"\w* given Solomon wisdom, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H1696"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H1961"\w*; \w and|strong="H1696"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* peace between Hiram \w and|strong="H1696"\w* Solomon, \w and|strong="H1696"\w* \w they|strong="H1696"\w* \w made|strong="H1696"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* agreement together.

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w King|strong="H5921"\w* Solomon \w got|strong="H3318"\w* \w together|strong="H5921"\w* men \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* forced work \w through|strong="H4480"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* Israel, thirty thousand men \w in|strong="H5921"\w* number;

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* sent \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* Lebanon \w in|strong="H0935"\w* bands \w of|strong="H4428"\w* ten thousand \w every|strong="H3605"\w* month: \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H8085"\w* month \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* working \w in|strong="H0935"\w* Lebanon \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w for|strong="H0776"\w* two months \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* Adoniram \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* control \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* seventy thousand \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* work \w of|strong="H4428"\w* transport, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* eighty thousand stone-cutters \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* mountains;

\w In|strong="H0413"\w* \w addition|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* chiefs \w of|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* responsible \w men|strong="H0559"\w* \w put|strong="H7971"\w* \w by|strong="H0413"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* oversee \w the|strong="H0559"\w* work, three thousand \w and|strong="H7971"\w* three hundred \w in|strong="H0413"\w* authority \w over|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* workmen.

\w By|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* king's orders \w great|strong="H0430"\w* stones, stones \w of|strong="H1004"\w* high price, \w were|strong="H0834"\w* cut \w out|strong="H3045"\w*, \w so|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* base \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w might|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* squared \w stone|strong="H0834"\w*.

Solomon's builders \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Hiram's builders did \w the|strong="H3068"\w* work \w of|strong="H0430"\w* cutting \w them|strong="H5117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H5117"\w* edges \w on|strong="H5117"\w* \w them|strong="H5117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* got \w the|strong="H3068"\w* wood \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* stone \w ready|strong="H6258"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* building \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* house.
